name: [FANGAME] Shxtou Knife Throw Arcade Game
description:
Before starting MAKE SURE that Hardware Acceleration is enabled! Or download the game instead.

Visit me on Twitch & Twitter!

Twitch! (Click me I'm a link wee)

Twitter! (I am also a link click me!)

Hi there! I made this little fan game as a gift for Shxtou! He was the first Vtuber I super got into and was one of the reasons why I started to stream. My life has only really gone up since I entered the Vtubing community and I felt like making a little game like this was super necessary to give back the person who inspired me.

This arcade game is based on a real life one called Wonder Wheel. I wanted to adapt those elements of shooting a coin into throwing a knife at monsters to match Shxtou as a guild leader a lot more. 

All of the development of this game was streamed so if you want to watch it it'll be here and also here is a time-lapse as well [ will also do it later]
